function PreloadFiles takes nothing returns nothing

	call PreloadStart()
	call Preload( "<!-- Heroes generated with chat command "-website". -->" )
	call Preload( "<tr id="H0Q3">" )
	call Preload( "<td data-order="0" data-search="Hero Strength Melee">" )
	call Preload( "<div class="wowr-popover-wrapper">" )
	call Preload( "<div class="wowr-popover">" )
	call Preload( "<a href="heroes.html#H0Q3">" )
	call Preload( "<img class="wowr-icon" src="ReplaceableTextures/CommandButtons/BTNVillagerMan.blp" width="64" height="64"" )
	call Preload( "title="Hero Strength Melee"" )
	call Preload( "alt="ReplaceableTextures/CommandButtons/BTNVillagerMan.blp"" )
	call Preload( "/></a>" )
	call Preload( "Hero Strength Melee" )
	call Preload( "<br/>" )
	call Preload( "<br/>" )
	call Preload( "Customizable hero who you can pick any attributes, " )
	call Preload( "spells and skins for. Use the chat command "-rename " )
	call Preload( "X" to give the hero the name X.  " )
	call Preload( "<br/>" )
	call Preload( "<br/>" )

	call Preload( "<br/>" )
	call Preload( "<div style="color: #ffcc00">Mount: Gryphon.</div>" )
	call Preload( "<br/>" )
